definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
branch of study/administrative section/division/field/branch/stage directions/family (taxonomy)/rules/laws/to mete out (punishment)/to levy (taxes etc)/to fine sb/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: The study appears in the journal Nature  Geoscience.
sentences.chinese: 这项研究发表在《自然地球科学》期刊上。

sentences.english: Metallogeny is an applied branch of the earth sciences.
sentences.chinese: 成矿学是地球科学中一门很有应用价值的新兴学科。

sentences.english: Extensive directory of earth-science data sets.
sentences.chinese: 大量广泛的地球科学数据目录。

sentences.english: The findings have been published in the journal Nature Geoscience.
sentences.chinese: 研究结果已在《自然地球科学》期刊上发表。

sentences.english: PIMM and JENKINS work at the Nicholas School of the Environment and Earth Sciences at Duke University.
sentences.chinese: 皮姆与简金斯任职于杜克大学的环境与地球科学学院。

sentences.english: More than 40 years ago, a revolution in earth science arose.
sentences.chinese: 40多年以前，一场地球科学的革命发生了。

sentences.english: Their findings were recently published in Nature Geoscience.
sentences.chinese: 他们的发现最近被登上自然地球科学。

sentences.english: Precambrian geology is one of the major research fields of earth sciences.
sentences.chinese: 前寒武纪地质学是地球科学的主要研究领域之一。

sentences.english: Oth geoscience and human society are faced with the challenge of resources and environment.
sentences.chinese: 地球科学与人类社会同样面临资源与环境的挑战。

sentences.english: The theory of plate tectonics is one of the highly successful theories in the geosciences.
sentences.chinese: 板块构造学说是高度成功的地球科学理论。

sentences.english: However, if you have a strong interest in Earth science it is probably worth doing.
sentences.chinese: 阁下若对地球科学有浓厚的兴趣不妨一试。

sentences.english: JENKINS and PIMM work at the Nicholas School of the Environment and Earth Sciences at Duke University.
sentences.chinese: 简金斯与皮姆任职于杜克大学的环境与地球科学学院。
